00045 #include "Transform.h"

00047 class BBox;
00048 class RandomDeviate;
00049 class Ray;
00050 class SoNode;
00051 class Transform;

00059 class InstanceNode
00060 {
00061 public:
00062     InstanceNode( SoNode* node );
00063     InstanceNode( const InstanceNode* node );
00064     ~InstanceNode();
00065 
00066     void SetNode( SoNode* node );
00067     void SetParent( InstanceNode* parent );
00068     void AddChild( InstanceNode* child );
00069     void InsertChild( int row, InstanceNode* instanceChild);
00070 
00071     SoNode* GetNode() const;
00072     InstanceNode* GetParent() const;
00073     QString GetNodeURL() const;
00074     void Print( int level ) const;
00075 
00076     bool Intersect( const Ray& ray,
00077                                 RandomDeviate& rand,
00078                                 double* tHit,
00079                                                 InstanceNode** modelNode,
00080                                 bool* isFront,
00081                                 Ray* outRay);
00082 
00083     BBox GetIntersectionBBox();
00084     Transform GetIntersectionTransform();
00085     void SetIntersectionBBox( BBox nodeBBox );
00086     void SetIntersectionTransform( Transform nodeTransform );
00087 
00088     QVector< InstanceNode* > children;
00089 
00090 private:
00091     SoNode* m_coinNode;
00092     InstanceNode* m_parent;
00093     BBox m_bbox;
00094     Transform m_transformWTO;
00095     Transform m_transformOTW;
00096 };
00097 
00098 QDataStream & operator<< ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode& node );
00099 QDataStream & operator>> ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode& node );
00100 bool operator==( const InstanceNode& thisNode,const InstanceNode& otherNode );
00101 
00102 inline void InstanceNode::SetParent( InstanceNode* parent )
00103 {
00104         m_parent = parent;
00105 }
00106 
00107 inline void InstanceNode::SetNode( SoNode* node )
00108 {
00109         m_coinNode = node;
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline SoNode* InstanceNode::GetNode() const
00113 {
00114         return m_coinNode;
00115 }
00116 
00120 inline InstanceNode* InstanceNode::GetParent() const
00121 {
00122         return m_parent;
00123 }
